fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the Jackal (4423A) dies, you are promoted to the Jackal.
- You win with the Jackal and vice versa, as well as other Sidekicks.
- During the day, you may choose to immediately kill the Jackal, and instantly be promoted. You may also kill them normally at night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.
